title: India Economic Growth Strong
summary: India's economy shows robust growth in Q1 2026, driven by manufacturing and services sectors. Exports rise amid global demand.

title: EU Climate Policy Update
summary: European Union announces new carbon reduction targets for 2030. Focus on renewable energy transition and green tech investments.

title: AI Breakthrough in Protein Folding
summary: New ML model achieves 95% accuracy in protein structure prediction, revolutionizing drug discovery and biotech research.

title: Nifty 50 Hits Record High
summary: Indian benchmark index surges 2.5% amid positive earnings and foreign inflows. IT and banking sectors lead gains.

title: US-EU Trade Talks Progress
summary: President Trump and EU leaders agree on tariff reductions. Deal expected to boost transatlantic commerce.

title: India Wins Test Series
summary: Cricket team defeats Australia by innings victory. Rohit Sharma century powers comprehensive win.

title: मुंबईत अवकाळी पाऊस
summary: मुंबईसह कोकणात जोरदार पावसाची शक्यता. IMD चा इशारा, वाहतूक व्यवस्थेचा लक्षणीय अभाव.
